Book authorizations are available to all students whose Financial Aid exceeds the cost of their tuition and fees.

To be eligible for a book authorization, you must be registered for the classes you are requesting books for, your account must be current, all documents and forms necessary for disbursement of funds must be completed. In addition, the Federal Funds Authorization form must be completed:

If you elect to authorize your Title IV funds, please follow the instructions below:

  1. Go to www.laverne.edu and click on La Verne Portal, login with your email name and email password.
  2. On the left side menu, scroll down to Financial Aid & Student Accts.
  3. Click on Award.
  4. Click on Award by Aid Year.
  5. Select Aid Year 2022-2023
  6. Under the Resources tab, go to  the section:  I authorize Student Accounts to apply excess Federal Funds to pay other charges besides tuition, fees, room and board which are billed to my student account.
  7. Select Accept to authorize.

For each Semester or Trimester, a list of eligible students will be available at the bookstore and updated every three days during the dates listed below.  Students can verify the dollar amount available to them with the bookstore personnel and purchase their books using the book authorization.  The books will be billed to their student account before their financial aid is disbursed.

To be eligible for a book authorization, please make sure you can answer yes to ALL of the questions listed below:

  • Am I registered in the minimum number of units required to be eligible  for Financial Aid?
  • Does my Financial Aid exceed my tuition and fees?
  • Have I satisfied all the requirements necessary for disbursement? (ex., terms and conditions, financial agreement, entrance counseling, etc..)
  • Have I signed a Federal Funds Authorization form?
